mma_general_coordination_drills.name: Integrated Footwork Shadowboxing
mma_general_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Ensure adequate space for lateral movement.
mma_general_coordination_drills.description: Move through striking combinations with constant angle changes and stance resets. Focuses on smooth weight shifts, avoiding crossed feet, and reactive repositioning for fight-specific balance.

mma_general_coordination_drills.name: Single-Leg Cross-Body Punch
mma_general_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Dumbbell (optional) for added resistance; keep weight light to avoid compromising balance.
mma_general_coordination_drills.description: Balance on one leg while throwing slow, controlled crosses. Emphasizes knee stability (avoid hyperextension) and trunk-punch alignment for precision under instability.

mma_general_coordination_drills.name: Kick-and-Stick
mma_general_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Use a wall for support if needed during initial progression.
mma_general_coordination_drills.description: Throw a roundhouse or front kick and freeze the leg fully extended for 2–3 seconds. Engages glutes for hip stabilization and trains control in kicking mechanics.

mma_general_coordination_drills.name: Banded Triplanar Tap
mma_general_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Use light-moderate band tension anchored below knees.
mma_general_coordination_drills.description: Single-leg stance with band around knees; tap opposite foot forward/side/back without losing base. Prevents knee valgus and trains reactive stability for takedown defense.

mma_general_coordination_drills.name: Plank with Punch
mma_general_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Optional: Place hands on sliders to increase difficulty.
mma_general_coordination_drills.description: From a high plank, shift weight and punch alternately while keeping hips level. Builds core-limb timing and simulates striking under fatigue.

mma_general_coordination_drills.name: Rotational Med Ball Shotput
mma_general_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Throw against a wall or to a partner for rebounding.
mma_general_coordination_drills.description: Lateral throw from a loaded stance, initiating power from the back foot. Reinforces hip-shoulder sequencing for hooks/clinch strikes.

mma_general_coordination_drills.name: Depth Drop to Stabilize
mma_general_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Start low; progress height only with mastery.
mma_general_coordination_drills.description: Step off box and stick landing softly, absorbing impact through hips/knees. Trains fight-ready stabilization after level changes.

mma_general_coordination_drills.name: Sprawl to Quick Strikes
mma_general_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Gloves optional to simulate fight conditions.
mma_general_coordination_drills.description: Drop into a sprawl, then explosively pop up into a combo. Sharpens defensive-offensive transitions under fatigue.

brawler_coordination_drills.name: Overhand Rush with Head Slip
brawler_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Partner throws light jabs to cue slips during entry.
brawler_coordination_drills.description: Charge forward behind a high guard while throwing overhand rights, incorporating reactive head slips. Trains closing distance aggressively while maintaining defensive responsibility.

brawler_coordination_drills.name: Blindfolded Heavy Bag Chaos
brawler_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Use wraps to protect hands; partner cues angle changes.
brawler_coordination_drills.description: Strike a heavy bag blindfolded while a partner randomly pushes/shakes it. Forces reliance on proprioceptive feedback to adjust punches and footwork mid-combo, simulating crowded brawling exchanges.

brawler_coordination_drills.name: Slip Rope with Counter Hooks
brawler_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Anchor rope to create zigzag path for lateral slips.
brawler_coordination_drills.description: Weave under a bungee rope while throwing hooks to body/head after each slip. Trains head movement-to-power shot transitions under spatial constraints, critical for infighting.

brawler_coordination_drills.name: Medicine Ball Clinch Knees
brawler_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Partner holds ball against abdomen to resist knee drives.
brawler_coordination_drills.description: From double-collar tie, drive knees upward while partner resists with med ball. Develops explosive hip extension and balance recovery after each knee, mimicking dirty boxing energy drains.

brawler_coordination_drills.name: Reactive Sprawl-to-Overhand
brawler_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Partner mimics takedown attempts with verbal/striking cues.
brawler_coordination_drills.description: React to partner’s takedown feints by sprawling, then immediately exploding into an overhand right. Sharpens proprioceptive reactions to level changes and scrambles.

brawler_coordination_drills.name: Unstable Surface Hook Combinations
brawler_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Stand on Bosu dome-side down for advanced instability.
brawler_coordination_drills.description: Throw 3–5 hook combos while balancing on unstable surface. Forces core engagement and compensational adjustments to maintain power generation—key for off-balance brawling.

brawler_coordination_drills.name: Tire Flip to Swarming Combo
brawler_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Focus on explosive hip drive during flip.
brawler_coordination_drills.description: Flip tire, then immediately swarm forward with punches (e.g., 1-2-3-2 combo). Links lower-body power to rapid upper-body coordination under fatigue, replicating fight-ending flurries.

brawler_coordination_drills.name: Chaos Angle Change Pivot
brawler_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Partner randomly calls direction changes during drill.
brawler_coordination_drills.description: Pivot off front foot at 45/90-degree angles while throwing hooks, reacting to partner's verbal cues. Trains rapid directional changes mid-combo—critical for cutting off the cage or cornering opponents.

brawler_coordination_drills.name: Blind Clinch Entry to Underhooks
brawler_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Partner wears MMA gloves to simulate realistic grips.
brawler_coordination_drills.description: With vision blocked, use hand-fighting to secure underhooks against a resisting partner. Sharpens proprioceptive sensitivity to upper-body positioning in tight spaces.

brawler_coordination_drills.name: Slip-Block-Counter Sandbag Drill
brawler_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Partner holds bag at shoulder height for body shots.
brawler_coordination_drills.description: Slip imaginary jabs, block body hooks (partner taps sandbag to your ribs), then counter with overhands. Integrates defensive reactions with offensive responses under tactile stimuli.

brawler_coordination_drills.name: Tumbling to Swarm
brawler_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Practice forward/backward rolls without using hands.
brawler_coordination_drills.description: Execute a forward roll, pop up immediately into a 3-punch combo. Mimics recovering from trips or failed takedowns while maintaining offensive pressure.

brawler_coordination_drills.name: Resistance Band Phone Booth Hooks
brawler_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Band tension should allow full rotation but force control.
brawler_coordination_drills.description: Throw hooks against band resistance while maintaining perfect form. Teaches controlled power generation in tight spaces—prevents wild swinging when fatigued.

brawler_coordination_drills.name: Reactive Wall Drill
brawler_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Stand 6-12" from wall to enforce compact mechanics.
brawler_coordination_drills.description: Partner calls random punch numbers (1-6) while you strike the wall pad without resetting stance. Develops combo fluidity and adaptability in pocket exchanges.

clinch_coordination_drills.name: Blindfolded Collar Tie Pummeling
clinch_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Partner wears gi or rashguard for realistic friction
clinch_coordination_drills.description: With vision blocked, alternate between collar ties and underhooks based solely on tactile feedback. Develops instinctive grip recognition in chaotic clinch battles.

clinch_coordination_drills.name: Thai Plum Knee-to-Sweep Chain
clinch_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Partner holds pads for knee targets
clinch_coordination_drills.description: From double collar tie: 3 knees → immediate inside trip. Trains the signature Muay Thai strike-to-takedown sequence while maintaining balance.

clinch_coordination_drills.name: Rotational Judo Throw Recovery
clinch_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Belt around waist for grip simulation
clinch_coordination_drills.description: As partner attempts hip throws, use whizzer and hip positioning to counterbalance. Focuses on proprioceptive hip alignment during defensive rotations.

clinch_coordination_drills.name: Wall Clinch Weight Shift Drill
clinch_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Use MMA gloves for realistic framing
clinch_coordination_drills.description: Against cage, alternate between cross-face pressure and underhook attacks. Teaches micro-adjustments in weight distribution for control.

clinch_coordination_drills.name: Medicine Ball Clinch Frame
clinch_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Press ball against wall at shoulder height
clinch_coordination_drills.description: Simulate framing against opponent's neck while maintaining active shoulder pressure. Builds endurance in key clinch control positions.

clinch_coordination_drills.name: Reactive Underhook Switch
clinch_coordination_drills.description: React to partner's pummeling attempts by switching between overhooks, underhooks, and whizzers. Sharpens grip transition speed.

clinch_coordination_drills.name: Knee Tap Balance Drill
clinch_coordination_drills.description: Practice defending single legs while balancing on unstable surface. Forces proper hip positioning through proprioceptive feedback.

clinch_coordination_drills.name: Clinch to Suplex Transition
clinch_coordination_drills.description: From over-under position, chain attempts between body locks and suplexes. Trains seamless offensive transitions.

clinch_coordination_drills.name: Neck Tie Level Changes
clinch_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Partner throws light uppercuts during drill
clinch_coordination_drills.description: Maintain collar tie while ducking under imaginary strikes. Develops defensive head movement within clinch range.

clinch_coordination_drills.name: Resistance Band Pummeling
clinch_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Bands anchored behind at shoulder height
clinch_coordination_drills.description: Perform pummeling drills against band resistance. Builds endurance for prolonged clinch battles.

clinch_coordination_drills.name: Fence Walking with Strikes
clinch_coordination_drills.description: Move laterally along cage while maintaining underhooks and throwing short strikes. Simulates cage-cutting sequences.

clinch_coordination_drills.name: Plum Clinch Knee Variations
clinch_coordination_drills.description: Alternate between straight, diagonal, and roundhouse knee trajectories without breaking clinch. Develops offensive versatility.

clinch_coordination_drills.name: Tactile Grip Fighting
clinch_coordination_drills.description: Eyes closed, identify and counter partner's grips within 2 seconds. Sharpens instant grip recognition.

clinch_coordination_drills.name: Sprawl to Front Headlock
clinch_coordination_drills.description: Sprawl → immediately transition to front headlock position. Trains defensive sequences against shot attempts.

clinch_coordination_drills.name: Clinch Exit Striking
clinch_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Partner holds mitts at break distance
clinch_coordination_drills.description: Break from clinch into 3-punch combinations. Perfects the strike-on-break timing.

clinch_coordination_drills.name: Sandbag Clinch Carry
clinch_coordination_drills.description: Maintain clinch position while walking laterally. Builds isometric endurance for control positions.

clinch_coordination_drills.name: Reactive Whizzer Counters
clinch_coordination_drills.description: Use whizzer to counter takedowns into knee strikes. Links defensive wrestling to offensive Muay Thai.

clinch_coordination_drills.name: Clinch Stance Hopping
clinch_coordination_drills.description: Hop through ladder while maintaining clinch stance. Improves footwork without breaking upper-body control.

clinch_coordination_drills.name: Over-Under Switch Drill
clinch_coordination_drills.description: Cycle between over-under, double underhooks, and body lock positions. Develops fluidity between control positions.

clinch_coordination_drills.name: Clinch to Guillotine Chain
clinch_coordination_drills.description: From collar tie, transition to guillotine attempts as partner ducks. Trains submission awareness in clinch exchanges.

pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.name: Sliding L-Step Jab
pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Ladder flat on ground or taped lines
pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.description: Step forward with jab, then slide lead foot laterally along ladder rung while keeping weight centered. Trains forward pressure with sudden angle changes.

pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.name: Band-Resisted Marching Guard
pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Band anchored behind at hip height
pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.description: March forward against band tension while maintaining high guard. Develops posture integrity when cutting off the cage.

pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.name: Pivot-Reset Shadowboxing
pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.description: Throw 3-punch combo, pivot 45° off centerline, reset stance. Conditions footwork to maintain cutting angles without crossing feet.

pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.name: Med Ball Chest Pass Recoil
pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.description: Throw ball forward explosively, immediately retract hands to guard position. Trains punch retraction during forward motion.

pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.name: Stagger-Stance Level Change
pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Optional: Hold light weight for instability
pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.description: From staggered stance, drop rear knee 1" to the floor and rise without losing balance. Mimics defensive dips during advances.

pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.name: Reactive Rope Maze
pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.description: Move forward through ropes while partner randomly tugs to disrupt balance. Simulates crowded forward pressure in fights.

pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.name: Slip-Roll-Step
pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Set bag to swing at cheek height
pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.description: Slip left, roll under right, step forward while bag resets. Chains defensive movements into forward motion.

pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.name: Towel Tug Stance Hops
pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Partner holds towel at waist height
pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.description: Hop forward in stance while partner provides irregular resistance. Trains weight distribution under pressure.

pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.name: Wall-Walk Shoulder Tap
pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.description: Walk hands along wall at shoulder height while maintaining fight stance. Reinforces upright posture during cage cuts.

pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.name: Blindfolded Pivot Drills
pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.description: Pivot 90° on command without visual cues. Sharpens spatial awareness during exchanges.

pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.name: Karaoke Step with Strikes
pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.description: Karaoke step (cross-behind) while throwing jabs. Trains hip-shoulder disassociation for cutting angles.

pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.name: Strike-Break-Strike
pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.description: Throw 2 punches, pause mid-combo, then resume. Conditions adaptive timing under pressure.

pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.name: Uneven Surface Guard Work
pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.description: Maintain high guard while standing on unstable surface. Improves compensatory adjustments during forward motion.

pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.name: Shadow Cut-Offs
pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.description: Mirror imaginary opponent's lateral movement while cutting off angles. Develops cage/ring cutting proprioception.

pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.name: Balloon Tracking
pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.description: Slip/block balloons while advancing forward. Trains visual processing during pressure sequences.

pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.name: Step-Drag Punch
pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.description: Step lead foot forward, drag rear foot while punching. Conditions proper weight distribution in forward attacks.

pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.name: Clap Push-Up to Guard
pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.description: Explosive clap push-up, immediately return to high guard. Trains arm recovery during swarming attacks.

pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.name: Partner Hand-Fight Walk
pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.description: Advance forward while battling for wrist/elbow control. Develops framing proprioception in the pocket.

pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.name: Staggered Stance Medicine Ball Rotations
pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.description: Hold ball at chest in staggered stance, rotate shoulders 90° without hip movement. Trains upper/lower body separation for cutting punches.

pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.name: Backward Roll to Sprint
pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Use wall for assisted roll if needed
pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.description: Execute backward roll, immediately spring up and sprint forward. Conditions rapid recovery during aggressive advances.

pressure_fighter_coordination_drills.description: Execute backward roll, immediately spring up and sprint forward. Conditions rapid recovery during aggressive advances.

counter_striker_coordination_drills.name: Slip-Catch-Return
counter_striker_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Use uneven-surface ball for unpredictable bounces
counter_striker_coordination_drills.description: Slip randomly bounced ball, catch after first bounce, immediately return throw while resetting stance. Trains reactive head movement + reset coordination.

counter_striker_coordination_drills.name: Pivot-Stick Landing
counter_striker_coordination_drills.description: Pivot 45° off lead leg onto balance pad, freeze for 2 seconds. Develops precise weight transfer for counter-angle creation.

counter_striker_coordination_drills.name: Feint-Parry-Cross
counter_striker_coordination_drills.description: Feint jab → parry imaginary cross → fire real cross as bag rebounds. Synchronizes upper/lower body timing for interceptive counters.

counter_striker_coordination_drills.name: Blindfolded Partner Taps
counter_striker_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Partner wears mitts for safe tapping
counter_striker_coordination_drills.description: Blindfolded athlete detects light shoulder/hip taps to initiate specific counters (e.g., rear tap = pull-counter). Heightens spatial awareness.

counter_striker_coordination_drills.name: Slope Backstep Counters
counter_striker_coordination_drills.description: Walk backward on decline, reacting to partner's visual cues to plant and counter. Trains balance during defensive retreats.

counter_striker_coordination_drills.name: Reactive Hoop Circles
counter_striker_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Hoop can be taped on floor
counter_striker_coordination_drills.description: Move around hoop's perimeter, changing direction on partner's clap. Develops edge awareness for ring/cage cutting.

counter_striker_coordination_drills.name: Medicine Ball Catch-Counter
counter_striker_coordination_drills.description: Catch ball mid-chest while pivoting, immediately throw back into rear-hand counter. Trains weight transfer under external load.

counter_striker_coordination_drills.name: Strobe Light Sparring
counter_striker_coordination_drills.description: Light technical sparring with strobe glasses forcing intermittent vision. Sharpens anticipatory timing between visual gaps.

counter_striker_coordination_drills.name: Uneven Surface Check-Hooks
counter_striker_coordination_drills.description: Throw check hooks while standing on Bosu, maintaining shoulder-hip alignment. Conditions off-balance counters.

counter_striker_coordination_drills.name: Mirror Footwork Drills
counter_striker_coordination_drills.description: Mirror a partner's footwork patterns in real-time, reversing roles every 30sec. Enhances predictive footwork reading.

counter_striker_coordination_drills.name: Band-Resisted Pull Counters
counter_striker_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Anchor band behind at head height
counter_striker_coordination_drills.description: Throw pull counters against band tension, emphasizing crisp torso rotation without over-committing.

counter_striker_coordination_drills.name: Reactive Ladder Check Kicks
counter_striker_coordination_drills.description: Move through ladder, throwing teeps when partner raises mitts. Trains kick timing during footwork transitions.

counter_striker_coordination_drills.name: Plyo-Clap Parry Drills
counter_striker_coordination_drills.description: Parry imaginary jabs on each clap, countering on double-clap cues. Develops rhythm disruption skills.

counter_striker_coordination_drills.name: Weight-Shift Knee Blocks
counter_striker_coordination_drills.description: Shift weight to rear leg while raising lead leg to block, immediately returning to stance. Trains defensive balance for low-kick counters.

counter_striker_coordination_drills.name: Sliding Counter Combo
counter_striker_coordination_drills.description: Slip outside while sliding back, then explode forward with 1-2-counter. Mimics Mayweather's shoulder roll counters.

counter_striker_coordination_drills.name: Reactive Star Drill
counter_striker_coordination_drills.description: Move to randomly called cones, throwing specific counters at each (e.g., cone 1 = check hook). Develops spatial strike mapping.

counter_striker_coordination_drills.name: Balloon Tracking
counter_striker_coordination_drills.description: Track drifting balloon while maintaining stance, striking when it crosses target line. Improves focus under visual distraction.

counter_striker_coordination_drills.name: Wobble Board Counters
counter_striker_coordination_drills.description: Throw straight counters while maintaining balance on wobble board. Conditions stable striking under platform shifts.

counter_striker_coordination_drills.name: Delayed Audio Counters
counter_striker_coordination_drills.description: Counter mitt work with delayed audio feedback. Forces reliance on proprioception rather than auditory timing.

counter_striker_coordination_drills.name: Inverse Shadowboxing
counter_striker_coordination_drills.description: Shadowbox while reversing all footwork directions (e.g., step left when intending right). Rewires neural pathways for adaptive counters.

kicker_coordination_drills.name: Blindfolded Roundhouse Balance
kicker_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Use a sleep mask or scarf
kicker_coordination_drills.description: Throw slow roundhouse kicks blindfolded, holding extension for 3 seconds. Forces reliance on proprioception rather than visual cues for balance.

kicker_coordination_drills.name: Swiss Ball Teep Control
kicker_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Lean back against ball against wall
kicker_coordination_drills.description: From seated Swiss ball position, throw teep kicks while maintaining ball stability. Trains core-kick integration under instability.

kicker_coordination_drills.name: Pivot-and-Catch Drill
kicker_coordination_drills.description: After throwing a kick, pivot 360° and catch the ball mid-spin. Enhances spatial orientation during kicking combinations.

kicker_coordination_drills.name: Slackline Switch Kicks
kicker_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Start with feet on line, progress to kicks
kicker_coordination_drills.description: Throw alternating switch kicks while balanced on a slackline. Drills micro-adjustments for kick transitions under instability.

kicker_coordination_drills.name: Band-Resisted Knee Chamber
kicker_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Anchor band to ankle, pull backward
kicker_coordination_drills.description: Slowly chamber knees against band resistance, focusing on hip flexor control and precise retraction.

kicker_coordination_drills.name: Obstacle Course Kicking
kicker_coordination_drills.description: Navigate obstacles (e.g., step over hurdles, circle cones) before delivering accurate kicks to pads. Trains kick timing in chaotic environments.

kicker_coordination_drills.name: Eyes-Closed Axe Kick
kicker_coordination_drills.description: With eyes closed, throw axe kicks to lightly touch (not strike) the noodle. Sharpens distance perception without visual feedback.

kicker_coordination_drills.name: Single-Leg Hop to Head Kick
kicker_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Use chalk mark for hop target
kicker_coordination_drills.description: Hop laterally on one leg, then immediately throw a head kick. Trains kick setup from unbalanced positions.

kicker_coordination_drills.name: Moving Target Side Kick
kicker_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Hang ball from string at knee height
kicker_coordination_drills.description: Strike a swinging ball with side kicks, adjusting timing to moving targets. Improves real-time distance calculation.

kicker_coordination_drills.name: Wobble Board Crescent Kick
kicker_coordination_drills.description: Throw crescent kicks while balancing on a wobble board. Forces ankle/hip stabilization during rotational kicks.

kicker_coordination_drills.name: Backward Roll to Spin Kick
kicker_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Use 2" thick judo or gymnastics mat
kicker_coordination_drills.description: Perform a backward roll, then immediately stand into a spinning back kick. Develops kick recovery from compromised positions.

kicker_coordination_drills.name: Partner Blind Angle Kick
kicker_coordination_drills.description: With eyes fixed forward, kick toward partners positioned peripherally using only auditory cues. Trains non-visual angle striking.

kicker_coordination_drills.name: Plyo Box Level Change Kick
kicker_coordination_drills.description: Step off box and immediately throw a body kick mid-descent. Conditions proper weight transfer during elevation changes.

kicker_coordination_drills.name: Sliding Surface Front Kick
kicker_coordination_drills.description: Throw front kicks while standing on sliders, controlling slide momentum. Mimics kicking on slippery surfaces.

kicker_coordination_drills.name: Reactive Band-Resisted Roundhouse
kicker_coordination_drills.description: Throw roundhouses against unpredictable band resistance, focusing on smooth deceleration and retraction.

kicker_coordination_drills.name: Water Depth Kicking
kicker_coordination_drills.description: Execute kicks underwater at varying depths. Water resistance enhances proprioceptive feedback through full range of motion.

kicker_coordination_drills.name: Obstacle Dodge to Counter Kick
kicker_coordination_drills.description: Duck/weave through obstacles, then immediately counter with kicks. Trains kick setups from defensive movements.

kicker_coordination_drills.name: Trampoline Switch Kick
kicker_coordination_drills.description: Throw alternating switch kicks mid-bounce, maintaining balance during aerial transitions.

kicker_coordination_drills.name: Sloped Surface Roundhouse
kicker_coordination_drills.description: Throw roundhouse kicks while standing on a slope (facing up/down/sidehill). Adapts mechanics to uneven ground.

kicker_coordination_drills.name: Mirror Drill - Shadow Kicking
kicker_coordination_drills.description: Throw kicks while matching mirror-image movements with a partner. Enhances bilateral coordination and technique symmetry.

scrambler_coordination_drills.name: Hip Heist Mirror Drill
scrambler_coordination_drills.description: Partners mirror hip heist movements without visual cues, relying on tactile feedback. Develops proprioceptive hip control for standups.

scrambler_coordination_drills.name: Blindfolded Turtle Spin
scrambler_coordination_drills.description: From turtle position, rotate 360° while maintaining base, then explode to standing. Trains body awareness without visual reference.

scrambler_coordination_drills.name: Reactive Knee-on-Belly Escape
scrambler_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Partner randomly tosses balls during escapes
scrambler_coordination_drills.description: Escape knee-on-belly while catching tennis balls tossed unpredictably. Forces adaptive weight distribution.

scrambler_coordination_drills.name: Band-Resisted Granby Rolls
scrambler_coordination_drills.description: Perform Granby rolls with band tension, maintaining tight rotation. Enhances kinesthetic sense in inverted positions.

scrambler_coordination_drills.name: Plyo Mat Level Changes
scrambler_coordination_drills.description: Step/jump between mats of different heights, immediately defending takedowns from partner. Trains adaptive level changes.

scrambler_coordination_drills.name: Sliding Shield Get-Up
scrambler_coordination_drills.description: Perform technical stand-up with one foot sliding unpredictably. Forces compensatory core engagement.

scrambler_coordination_drills.name: Reactionary Sprawl Matrix
scrambler_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Partner shouts commands during ball bounces
scrambler_coordination_drills.description: Sprawl/react to ball bounces while processing verbal takedown cues. Trains divided attention scrambling.

scrambler_coordination_drills.name: Uneven Surface Hip Switch
scrambler_coordination_drills.description: Switch hips in guard/recovery positions on unstable surface. Sharpens micro-adjustments.

scrambler_coordination_drills.name: Blind Mat Returns
scrambler_coordination_drills.description: Roll/turn randomly, then locate mat edge without vision. Develops cage/wall awareness when grounded.

scrambler_coordination_drills.name: Tactile Stand-Up Chain
scrambler_coordination_drills.description: Technical stand-up while partner disrupts with unpredictable grips. Trains adaptive stand-up mechanics.

scrambler_coordination_drills.name: Directional Scramble Reaction
scrambler_coordination_drills.description: Scramble through ladder rungs while reacting to partner's directional cues. Combines footwork with chaotic reorientation.

scrambler_coordination_drills.name: Falling Base Recovery
scrambler_coordination_drills.description: Deliberately fall backward/sideways, immediately recovering base. Trains automatic limb placement on impact.

scrambler_coordination_drills.name: Obstacle Guard Retention
scrambler_coordination_drills.description: Maintain guard while partner pushes legs toward obstacles. Forces precise limb redirection.

scrambler_coordination_drills.name: Weighted Limb Isolation
scrambler_coordination_drills.description: Perform technical stand-ups/hip escapes with uneven weighting. Enhances compensatory coordination.

scrambler_coordination_drills.name: Shadow Scramble Flow
scrambler_coordination_drills.description: Fluidly chain: shot → sprawl → stand-up → pivot → shot. Trains seamless transition proprioception without resistance.

distance_striker_coordination_drills.name: Pivot-and-Stick Landing
distance_striker_coordination_drills.description: Throw rear straight, pivot 45° on lead foot, and freeze. Checks weight distribution during rotational exits from exchanges.

distance_striker_coordination_drills.name: Blindfolded Teep Range Finding
distance_striker_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Partner holds palm at varying distances
distance_striker_coordination_drills.description: Eyes closed, throw front kicks to lightly touch partner's palm. Sharpens spatial mapping without visual cues.

distance_striker_coordination_drills.name: Sliding Lateral Jab
distance_striker_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Requires slippery floor for optimal slide
distance_striker_coordination_drills.description: Slide lead foot laterally while jabbing, keeping rear foot planted. Trains independent upper/lower body control.

distance_striker_coordination_drills.name: BOSU Ball Straight Blast
distance_striker_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Start with 30% power, focus on balance
distance_striker_coordination_drills.description: Throw 1-2 combinations on BOSU ball. Forces micro-adjustments to maintain upright posture during strikes.

distance_striker_coordination_drills.name: Reactive Step-Back Counter
distance_striker_coordination_drills.description: Time step-back with counter cross as partner moves forward. Drills distance reset timing under pressure.

distance_striker_coordination_drills.name: Band-Resisted Angle Creation
distance_striker_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Anchor band to simulate opponent pressure
distance_striker_coordination_drills.description: Step offline at 45° while throwing check hook against band resistance. Trains angle generation against forward pressure.

distance_striker_coordination_drills.name: Swiss Ball Kneeling Strikes
distance_striker_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Kneel on ball, maintain upright posture
distance_striker_coordination_drills.description: Throw elbows/palm strikes while kneeling on Swiss ball. Challenges micro-adjustments in unstable positions.

distance_striker_coordination_drills.name: Tandem Stance Switch Kick
distance_striker_coordination_drills.description: Switch stance while throwing roundhouse from tandem stance. Tests precise weight transfer in restricted base.

distance_striker_coordination_drills.name: Reactive Hoop Drills
distance_striker_coordination_drills.description: Strike through moving hula hoop without touching edges. Develops visual-motor targeting under unpredictability.

distance_striker_coordination_drills.name: Slackline Jab Game
distance_striker_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Start with static jabs, progress to combos
distance_striker_coordination_drills.description: Throw jabs while walking slackline. Ultimate integration of striking and dynamic balance.

distance_striker_coordination_drills.name: Fencing Lunge Jab
distance_striker_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Lead knee must track over toes
distance_striker_coordination_drills.description: Lunge forward from en garde stance to jab, emphasizing proper knee alignment and sudden distance closing.

distance_striker_coordination_drills.name: Plyo Push-Up to Cross
distance_striker_coordination_drills.description: Perform plyometric push-up, immediately transition to standing rear cross. Trains rapid posture recovery for counter opportunities.

distance_striker_coordination_drills.name: Wobble Board Teep Timing
distance_striker_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Start with single-leg balance before adding kicks
distance_striker_coordination_drills.description: Throw front kicks while balancing on wobble board. Enhances hip stability during linear kicks.

distance_striker_coordination_drills.name: Blind Angle Cutting
distance_striker_coordination_drills.description: Eyes closed, throw combo then pivot exactly 90°. Develops internal awareness of ring geography.

distance_striker_coordination_drills.name: Sliding Defensive Shell
distance_striker_coordination_drills.description: Slide laterally while maintaining peek-a-boo guard. Trains defensive posture during lateral movement.

distance_striker_coordination_drills.name: Medicine Ball Catch-Strike
distance_striker_coordination_drills.description: Catch tossed med ball, immediately transfer momentum into hook. Reinforces kinetic chains from catch to strike.

distance_striker_coordination_drills.name: Uneven Surface Stance Dance
distance_striker_coordination_drills.description: Switch stances while standing on uneven surfaces. Forces adaptive weight distribution.

distance_striker_coordination_drills.name: Reactive Ladder In-Outs
distance_striker_coordination_drills.description: Perform ladder drills reacting to random 'in/out' verbal cues. Trains footwork adaptability under cognitive load.

distance_striker_coordination_drills.name: Towel Snap Reflex
distance_striker_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Partner snaps towel at varying rhythms
distance_striker_coordination_drills.description: Avoid snapping towel while countering. Develops flinch-resistant defensive reactions.

distance_striker_coordination_drills.name: Single-Leg Roundhouse Hold
distance_striker_coordination_drills.description: Throw roundhouse, hold leg extended for time. Builds hip stabilizer endurance for kicking balance.

distance_striker_coordination_drills.name: Mirror Footwork
distance_striker_coordination_drills.description: Mirror partner's lateral movements exactly. Enhances spatial mirroring for cage/corner management.

distance_striker_coordination_drills.name: Punching Metronome
distance_striker_coordination_drills.description: Strike in rhythm with tempo changes. Trains punch timing under paced variations.

distance_striker_coordination_drills.name: Obstacle Course Combos
distance_striker_coordination_drills.description: Weave through hurdles, striking pads at intervals. Simulates in-fight obstacle navigation.

distance_striker_coordination_drills.name: Water Bag Striking
distance_striker_coordination_drills.description: Punch/kick floating water bag. Unstable target forces precision adjustments mid-strike.

distance_striker_coordination_drills.name: Shadowboxing with Ankle Weights
distance_striker_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Max 3 rounds to avoid form breakdown
distance_striker_coordination_drills.description: Shadowbox with light ankle weights. Exaggerates proprioceptive feedback for technique refinement.

submission_hunter_coordination_drills.name: Blindfolded Gripping Sequences
submission_hunter_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Partner provides minimal resistance during transitions.
submission_hunter_coordination_drills.description: With vision blocked, cycle through 5 grip combinations (e.g., collar-sleeve to wrist control) using touch alone. Develops tactile sensitivity for submission setups.

submission_hunter_coordination_drills.name: Knee-Cut Ankle Pick
submission_hunter_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Partner stands on one leg to exaggerate balance disruption.
submission_hunter_coordination_drills.description: From standing, cut knee across partner's thigh while simultaneously scooping their ankle. Trains coordinated upper/lower body attacks for leg entanglements.

submission_hunter_coordination_drills.name: Rolling Omoplata Entry
submission_hunter_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Use padded surface for repeated reps.
submission_hunter_coordination_drills.description: Initiate forward roll while trapping an arm, landing in omoplata position. Enhances spatial awareness during rotational submissions.

submission_hunter_coordination_drills.name: Single-Leg Spider Guard Transitions
submission_hunter_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Band around one ankle to simulate opponent pressure.
submission_hunter_coordination_drills.description: Maintain spider guard while switching grips and lifting hips against band tension. Isolates leg control coordination under resistance.

submission_hunter_coordination_drills.name: Tactical Stand-Up to Guillotine
submission_hunter_coordination_drills.description: Technical stand-up while simultaneously trapping head for guillotine. Links defensive frames to opportunistic submissions.

submission_hunter_coordination_drills.name: Inverted Triangle Spin
submission_hunter_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Ball supports hips during initial learning phase.
submission_hunter_coordination_drills.description: From inverted guard, spin 180 degrees while locking triangle legs. Trains rotational control during advanced submissions.

submission_hunter_coordination_drills.name: Saddle Entry from Turtle
submission_hunter_coordination_drills.description: From turtle, slide knee across partner's hip while capturing far leg. Coordinates upper body grips with lower body entanglement.

submission_hunter_coordination_drills.name: Flopping Armbars
submission_hunter_coordination_drills.description: Step back over partner's arm while maintaining extension, landing in armbar position. Teaches submission finishing during positional shifts.

submission_hunter_coordination_drills.name: Standing Kimura Chain
submission_hunter_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Partner alternates between neutral and defensive grips.
submission_hunter_coordination_drills.description: Cycle through 3 kimura grip variations (palm-up/palm-down/behind-back) without breaking contact. Enhances grip transition fluidity.

submission_hunter_coordination_drills.name: Rolling Bow-and-Arrow Entry
submission_hunter_coordination_drills.description: Forward roll while maintaining back control, transitioning directly into bow-and-arrow choke setup. Links movement to submission opportunities.

submission_hunter_coordination_drills.name: Blindfolded Ankle Lock Defense
submission_hunter_coordination_drills.equipment_notes: Partner applies slow, controlled ankle locks.
submission_hunter_coordination_drills.description: With vision blocked, defend ankle locks using only foot/hip awareness. Sharpens defensive coordination under sensory deprivation.

submission_hunter_coordination_drills.name: Flying Armbar from Combat Base
submission_hunter_coordination_drills.description: From combat base, launch into armbar while maintaining shoulder control throughout flight. Trains whole-body coordination during aerial submissions.

submission_hunter_coordination_drills.name: Reverse De La Riva to Heel Hook
submission_hunter_coordination_drills.description: From reverse DLR, invert while capturing heel across hip line. Coordinates off-balancing with precise leg attacks.

submission_hunter_coordination_drills.name: Tornado Guard Spin
submission_hunter_coordination_drills.description: 360-degree spin while maintaining tornado guard hooks. Develops orientation control during complex guard transitions.

submission_hunter_coordination_drills.name: Wall-Walk Rear Naked
submission_hunter_coordination_drills.description: Walk feet up wall while maintaining rear naked choke grips. Trains submission retention during positional scrambling.

drills.name: Blindfolded Grapevine Entry
drills.description: Blindfolded athlete steps on markers in grapevine pattern (criss-cross), then shoots for double-leg on partner's touch cue. Sharpens foot placement awareness for cage work.

drills.name: Unstable Thai Plum Reaction
drills.description: Maintain Thai plum stance on Bosu while resisting partner's pushes. Harness forces cervical spine awareness during off-balancing.

drills.name: Reactive Banded Pivot
drills.description: Pivot 45° against band tension when strobe flashes, then counter strike. Combines visual disruption with load for reactive pivoting.

drills.name: Tactile Takedown Chain
drills.description: Eyes closed, athlete identifies mat texture to initiate specific transitions (e.g., bumpy = granby roll, smooth = hip heist).

drills.name: Inverted Strike Recovery
drills.description: From inverted hang in rings, release one arm to 'catch' a tennis ball tossed by partner, then return to stance for kick. Trains spatial flipping awareness.

drills.name: Weight-Shift Step-Over
drills.description: Step over 12

drills.name: Disrupted Single-Leg Balance
drills.description: Hold single-leg position on vibrating platform for 20s, then immediately finish double-leg. Challenges proprioception under fatigue.

drills.name: 3D Head Movement Grid
drills.description: Slip/roll through grid without ball contact, reacting to partner's directional taps on shoulders. Enhances head movement spatial mapping.

drills.name: Proprioceptive Guard Retention
drills.description: Eyes closed, use glove texture differences to identify partner's grip attempts and counter. Heightens tactile sensitivity for guard play.

drills.name: Dynamic Rope Transition
drills.description: Climb 3 knots up, then transition to striking combos against pads without looking at hands. Forces grip awareness during stance switches.

drills.name: Asymmetric Catch-Pivot
drills.description: Catch ball mid-air while pivoting, adjusting to uneven weight distribution before countering. Trains torque control.

drills.name: Haptic Cage Cutting
drills.description: Navigate tape angles blindfolded using foot contact alone, then explode into cage knee. Mimics cutting off opponents by feel.

drills.name: Vestibular Shot Reset
drills.description: After 3 spins, immediately shoot for takedown on auditory cue. Trains reorientation after dizziness (common in scrambles).

drills.name: Proprioceptive Arm Trap
drills.description: Eyes closed, trap partner's arm using only resistance feedback to gauge limb positioning. Drills feel-based submissions.

drills.name: Kinesthetic Kick Check
drills.description: Check kicks against moving roller without visual tracking (partner calls 'incoming'). Develops reflexive low-line defense.

drills.name: Blindfolded Roundhouse Chamber Hold
drills.description: From blindfolded stance, chamber rear kick and hold for 5 seconds while lightly touching bar for balance. Trains muscle memory for perfect chamber position.

drills.name: Pivot-React Switch Kick
drills.description: Pivot 45° when floor pad lights up, then immediately fire switch kick toward target. Combines visual reaction with kicking mechanics.

drills.name: Unstable Teep-Push Sequence
drills.description: Throw push kicks from Bosu ball, maintaining balance as bag swings back. Forces core engagement in kicking exchanges.

drills.name: Tactile Low-Kick Check
drills.equipment: Foam roller (partner rolls at shin height)
drills.description: Eyes closed, check low kicks by raising leg when hearing roller approach. Heightens reflexive leg defense.

drills.name: Sliding Roundhouse Combo
drills.description: Slide laterally while throwing rear roundhouse, controlling momentum to avoid over-rotation. Mimics angle creation in fights.

drills.name: Dynamic Axe Kick Balance
drills.description: Throw axe kicks while holding TRX straps, stopping kick 10cm short of full extension. Builds deceleration control for head kicks.

drills.name: Reactive Hopping Front Kick
drills.description: Hop forward when mat lights up, immediately firing front kick to pad. Links explosive entry with kicking precision.

drills.name: Wobble Board Switch Kick
drills.description: Throw switch kicks while maintaining balance on board. Isolates ankle/knee stability during power kicks.

drills.name: Resisted Knee-Kick Chain
drills.description: Throw 3 knees followed by roundhouse against band tension. Trains hip flexor endurance for late-round kicking.

drills.name: Mirror Shadow Kicking
drills.description: Mirror partner's kicking combinations while maintaining perfect form reflection. Enhances spatial awareness for range management.

drills.name: Slope-Adjusted Side Kick
drills.description: Throw side kicks while walking backward on incline treadmill. Forces proper hip alignment in pushing kicks under load.

drills.name: Ball-Catch Roundhouse
drills.description: Catch ball after one bounce, then immediately pivot into roundhouse. Trains weight transfer during visual distractions.

drills.name: Hurdle Hop-Kick Combo
drills.description: Hop over hurdle, land softly, then fire question-mark kick. Links vertical explosiveness with technical kicking.

drills.name: Weighted Shin-Block Simulation
drills.description: Practice checking kicks with weighted leg, emphasizing slow eccentric lowering. Builds defensive muscle memory under fatigue.

drills.name: 360° Spin-Kick Balance
drills.description: Perform spinning back kick on beam, freezing in finish position for 3 seconds. Trains dizzy recovery for spinning techniques.

drills.name: Blindfolded Shoulder Roll Entry
drills.description: Blindfolded boxer steps forward under rope while executing shoulder rolls, reacting to partner's light chest taps for angle adjustments. Trains close-quarters defensive entries.

drills.name: Sliding Lateral Pivot
drills.description: Slide laterally off lead foot to create angle, then pivot into cross. Targets weight transfer precision for long-range counters.

drills.name: Clinch Frame & Strike
drills.description: Maintain forearm frame against band resistance while throwing short uppercuts. Mimics striking in phone-booth clinches.

drills.name: Chaos Slip-Burst
tags.equipment: Randomly swinging tennis balls (3x, head height)
tags.description: Slip swinging balls, then explode forward with 3-punch combo. Conditions aggression under visual distraction.

tags.name: Wall-Assisted Swarm
tags.equipment: Wall pads (or heavy bag against wall)
tags.description: Throw rapid combinations while chest lightly brushes heavy bag. Forces compact punches in tight spaces.

tags.name: Reactive L-Step
tags.description: Step through ladder in L-patterns when strobe flashes. Conditions footwork for cutting off the ring.

tags.name: Unstable Philly Shell
tags.description: Hold Philly shell stance on Bosu while partner throws light body shots. Trains balance under fire.

tags.name: Pendulum Cross-Counter
tags.description: As bag swings toward you, time cross-counter at peak momentum. Sharpens interceptive timing.

tags.name: Resisted Angle Jump
tags.description: Jump 45° laterally against band resistance, then pivot into hook. Trains explosive angle creation.

tags.name: Eyes-Closed Parry Drill
tags.description: Eyes closed, parry mitts based on verbal cues. Develops feel-based defense for clinch entries.

tags.name: Backstep Check Hook
tags.description: Step backward off treadmill belt, then plant for check hook. Trains balance on retreat.

tags.name: Chaos Corner Drill
tags.description: Cut off partner in a corner while reacting to thrown tennis balls. Conditions aggression under sensory overload.
